publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-270 Jim Hume: Sing When You’re Winning—That the Parliament congratulates Dumfries Area Choir of the National Youth Choir of Scotland on its achievement of performing at the Session Three official opening of the Scottish Parliament; recognises the hard work and dedication of the choir members and organisers, and notes the benefits in terms of breadth of experience, confidence and social interaction which the choir gives its young people.
S3M-270 Sing When You’re Winning (lodged on 29 June 2007) Alasdair Allan*
S3M-270 Sing When You’re Winning (lodged on 29 June 2007) Jack McConnell*
